author: civanch
body:
#### PR description:
Code clean-up, debug information improvement, dead code removal. No change of results of any WF is expected.

Added optional features:
1) detailed verbatim printout for MCtruth
2) added possibility to add Geant4 UI commands end of run
3) added command based scoring, which extend capabilities to study neutron and other background

#### PR validation:
private

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR: NO
title: Cleanup geant4 user code
